name: An iron-reinforced coffin lid
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It has average armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
